data.text: @StephFarrel @MdRational Yes, or perhaps they themselves should engage in robust research prior to making policy statements that appear to rest on foundations of rather impressionistic nature
@MDinCanada All vaccines should have a thorough review.
@MDinCanada @MdRational The CPSO should express more interest in investigating safety data and safeguarding public interests than policing members who are voicing legitimate concerns.

@Lizzielooface This is from a letter I wrote back in August. It will take me some time to formally assemble and write up the rather large volume of supportive literature.

 Am wondering if I should invoice CPSO for time spent doing this work, which is arguably theirs to do.
@MdRational This is from a letter I wrote back in August. The CPSO has expressed interest in the form of telling me they are investigating me - again.
@MDinCanada Is this from the cpso website?
@MDinCanada Where is the is text pulled from? Do you have a link you can share? This makes a lot of sense to me!
